

```{r}
# load libs
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
# get data sources
# get full names of data containing directories
data_dirs <- list.dirs(path = "data",
                       full.names = TRUE,
                       recursive = FALSE)


# exclude nonsense directories
data_dirs <- data_dirs[stringr::str_detect(data_dirs, "sim")]
```

```{r}
# get helper functions
source("code/helper_functions.R")

# get weight evol plot

temp_gen_data <- get_sim_weight_evol(data_folder = filepath,
                                     generations = seq(1, 999, 50))
```

```{r}
# plot the timeline
ggplot(temp_gen_data)+
  geom_tile(aes(gen, weight_value, fill = weight_prop))+
  facet_grid(~weight_id)+
  scale_fill_gradientn(colours = rev(pals::cubehelix(10)))+
  theme_bw()
```
